title: Harry Styles fan begs him for love advice about guy she's fancied for years
text:

Harry Styles left one of his superfans delighted when he doled out some love advice.

A fan, named Tisha, took to Twitter to publicly praise the One Direction star for taking the time to respond to her.

And despite fans begging to know more, she kept the advice he gave her between the two of them.

She had directly messaged him on Twitter asking what she should do about the guy that she's fancied for seven years, admitting she'd always been too scared to tell him how she really feels.

She said: "Dear @Harry_Styles, So there's a guy that I have had feelings for, for seven years now. I never told him because I've always been too scared to.

(Image: Twitter)

(Image: Getty Images)

"After all this time I think I want to tell him. If u give me a sign, I'll hit send. This is a chance I am willing to take. Let me know."

She sent the message out at 10.14pm, and just a few hours later, at 3.44am, Harry responded with his thoughts.

She wrote back to him: "Thank you from the bottom of my heart for your advice sir. If you said so, I'll definitely go for it.

"Thank you so much for your message. I hope your day was good. Goodnight. I'll tell him and let you know how it went.

(Image: Getty Images for ARIA)

"And, if you ever need someone to talk to in life, you can always dm me, I'll always be there for you no matter what."

Tisha shared the exchange on Twitter, but covered Harry's advice to her with a giant love heart.

She told fellow fans: "Mr. Styles gave me a very good advice at 4AM at my place. Can't fall back asleep again.

"Thank you from the bottom of my heart @Harry_Styles. I'll do it and let you know how it went. If you ever need someone to talk to, dm me anytime of any day. Thank you again."

(Image: TV Grab)

Other 1D fans admitted that while they were desperate to know what advice he'd given her, they respected her for keeping it private.

One said: "The world wants to know what Harry said, obviously I do to. But can we talk about the absolute RESPECT going on here. Like wow. Imagine how Harry must feel after having a fan interaction that didn’t get plastered all over the Internet. It’s just between the two of you. I love it"

Another wrote: "he loves you so much tisha and it’s what you deserve, i’m so happy for you i can’t believe how beautiful and sweet he is"

description: The One Direction star left a superfan delighted when he told her exactly how to handle the situation
